item.title: China announced retaliation so quickly to purposely damage U.S. stock market, says Evercore ISI
item.description: China's retaliatory tariffs came earlier and stronger-than-expected in a surprising move against the U.S., according to Evercore ISI's China strategis...

item.title: Emerging markets fund is on track for biggest drop since 2020 due to tariff fears
item.description: The iShares MSCI Emerging Markets ETF (EEM) headed for its worst session since 2020 on Friday amid rising fears from Trump's tariffs.

item.title: This options trade protects and provides a steady income stream as stocks sell off
item.description: "April showers bring May flowers" is an old adage. Current trade tariff negotiations feel closer to a flash flood than a simple shower.

item.title: Evercore ISI upgrades auto parts stock, saying earnings could get a boost from tariffs
item.description: This auto parts stock may gain even in the face of President Donald Trump's new tariff regime, according to Evercore ISI.
